title: Making a team for flex queue. Gold+
body:
Gold 3 in Flex, Looking to put together a team of semi-serious to climb ranks together as often as possible. Play times will be in the afternoon 6pm and onwards most days. ATM me and 1 other are looking for ppl to fill MID/SUP/JUNGLE. But feel free to reply if you main another role as we may move the team around for you.

Just post on this and ill get to you ASAP.

replies.body: Mid/Supp player gold in solo and flex here ign- Freehugs2017
